title: Tennis at the 1990 Asian Games
text:
<a href="Tennis">Tennis</a> were contested at the <a href="1990%20Asian%20Games">1990 Asian Games</a> in Beijing International Tennis Center, <a href="Beijing">Beijing</a>, <a href="China">China</a> from September 24 to October 5, 1990.
Tennis had team, doubles, and singles events for both men and women, as well as a mixed doubles competition, a total of seven events.
